required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Efficacy and Safety of TEZ/IVA in Subjects Aged 6 Through 11 Years With Cystic Fibrosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tezacaftor in Combination With Ivacaftor in Subjects Aged 6 Through 11 Years With Cystic Fibrosis, Homozygous or Heterozygous for the F508del-CFTR Mutation

brief_summary.textblock: This study will evaluate the efficacy of tezacaftor in combination with ivacaftor (TEZ/IVA) in participants with cystic fibrosis (CF) aged 6 through 11 years, who are homozygous for the F508del mutation (F/F) or heterozygous for F508del with an eligible residual function mutation (F/RF).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Absolute Change in Lung Clearance Index 2.5 (LCI2.5) Through Week 8
primary_outcome.description: LCI2.5 represents the number of lung turnovers required to reduce the end tidal inert gas concentration to 1/40th of its starting value.

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute Change in Sweat Chloride At Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: Sweat samples were collected using an approved collection device.

secondary_outcome.measure: Absolute Change in Cystic Fibrosis Questionnaire-Revised (CFQ-R) Respiratory Domain Score Through Week 8
secondary_outcome.description: The CFQ-R is a validated participant-reported outcome measuring health-related quality of life for participants with cystic fibrosis. Respiratory domain assessed respiratory symptoms, score range: 0-100; higher scores indicating fewer symptoms and better health-related quality of life.

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety and Tolerability as Assessed Number of Participants With Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (AEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs) up to Safety Follow-up Visit
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug up to safety follow-up visit (up to Week 12)

arm_group.description: Participants with genotype F/F received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA fixed dose combination (FDC) in the morning and placebo matched to IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.

Participants with genotype F/F received TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks. Participants with genotype F/RF received TEZ/IVA FDC and placebo matched to IVA in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.
Participants with genotype F/RF received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in morning and evening for 8 weeks.

intervention.description: Participants weighing <40 kg received TEZ 50 mg/IVA 75 mg FDC tablet and those weighing ≥40 kg received TEZ 100 mg/IVA 150 mg FDC tablet.
Participants weighing <40 kg IVA 75 mg tablet and those weighing ≥40 kg received IVA 150 mg tablet.

criteria.textblock:
Key Inclusion Criteria:
- Homozygous for F508del or heterozygous for F508del and an RF mutation (as defined in the protocol).
- Participants with ppFEV1 of ≥70 percentage points adjusted for age, sex, height.
- Participants with a screening LCI2.5 result ≥7.5.
- Participants who are able to swallow tablets.
Key Exclusion Criteria:
- Clinically significant cirrhosis with or without portal hypertension.
- Colonization with organisms associated with a more rapid decline in pulmonary status.
- Solid organ or hematological transplantation.
Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion criteria may apply.

facility.name: Groupe Hospitalier Pellegrin - Hôpital des Enfants
Universitaetsklinikum Giessen und Marburg GmbH Standort Giessen
Klinika Mukowiscydozy, Oddział Chorób Płuc SZP ZOZ

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: A total of 69 participants were randomized, out of which 67 participants received study drug and were included in participant flow and baseline characteristics section.

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants with genotype F/F received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA fixed dose combination (FDC) in the morning and placebo matched to IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.

group.title: TEZ/IVA
group.description: Participants with genotype F/F received TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks. Participants with genotype F/RF received TEZ/IVA FDC and placebo matched to IVA in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.

group.title: Ivacaftor
group.description: Participants with genotype F/RF received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in morning and evening for 8 weeks.

group.description: Participants with genotype F/F received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA fixed dose combination (FDC) in the morning and placebo matched to IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.

group.title: TEZ/IVA

group.title: Ivacaftor
group.description: Participants with genotype F/RF received placebo matched to TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in morning and evening for 8 weeks.

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

measure.title: Lung Clearance Index 2.5 (LCI2.5)
measure.description: LCI2.5 represents the number of lung turnovers required to reduce the end tidal inert gas concentration to 1/40th of its starting value.

outcome.title: Absolute Change in Lung Clearance Index 2.5 (LCI2.5) Through Week 8
outcome.description: LCI2.5 represents the number of lung turnovers required to reduce the end tidal inert gas concentration to 1/40th of its starting value.
outcome.population: Full Analysis Set: all participants who were randomized, received at least 1 dose of study drug and had an eligible genotype. As per the pre-specified analysis, efficacy was only planned to be assessed for TEZ/IVA group. Placebo or IVA groups were used for blinding purposes only and were not applicable for the purpose of primary efficacy analysis.

group.title: TEZ/IVA
group.description: Participants with genotype F/F received TEZ/IVA FDC in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks. Participants with genotype F/RF received TEZ/IVA FDC and placebo matched to IVA in the morning and IVA in the evening for 8 weeks.

measure.title: Absolute Change in Lung Clearance Index 2.5 (LCI2.5) Through Week 8
measure.description: LCI2.5 represents the number of lung turnovers required to reduce the end tidal inert gas concentration to 1/40th of its starting value.
measure.population: Full Analysis Set: all participants who were randomized, received at least 1 dose of study drug and had an eligible genotype. As per the pre-specified analysis, efficacy was only planned to be assessed for TEZ/IVA group. Placebo or IVA groups were used for blinding purposes only and were not applicable for the purpose of primary efficacy analysis.

outcome.title: Absolute Change in Sweat Chloride At Week 8
outcome.description: Sweat samples were collected using an approved collection device.
outcome.population: FAS. As per the pre-specified analysis, efficacy was only planned to be assessed for TEZ/IVA group. Placebo or IVA groups were used for blinding purposes only and were not applicable for the purpose of secondary efficacy analysis.
